channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lara Trump steps down as co-chair of RNC amid Senate bid speculation

item.title: Court Filings Call For End Of Leftist Wisconsin AG’s Witch Hunt Against 2020 Trump Electors
item.description: The filings argue Democrat Attorney General Josh Kaul's bogus 'fake electors' case tramples state law and the Constitution's Supremacy Clause.

item.title: Ignore The Transgender Mob’s Attempts To Weaponize Your Kindness
item.description: It is time for us to push the absurd transgender activist agenda out of our schools, bathrooms, and sports and roll forward.

item.title: Kristen Welker’s Question To Trump About Birthright Citizenship Completely Misses The Point
item.description: The propaganda press exploits the lack of legal clarity about the issue to malign Trump as willing to stomp on the Constitution.

item.title: Survey: Homeschool And Christian School Graduates Far More Likely To Keep Their Faith
item.description: Public education is erasing America's future by killing the Christian beliefs that inspire parenthood.

item.title: An Outpouring of Pro-Terrorist Sentiment
item.description: Assassination is evidently now an acceptable tool of social change.

item.title: The Fall of Assad
item.description: It’s difficult to shed any tears about the fall of an evil dictator. But our hopes for a new Syria will be tempered by trepidation.

item.title: Trump names State Department picks, personal lawyer Alina Habba as counselor
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump picked several longtime national security and diplomacy officials for roles at the State Department.

item.title: The Cynical Sympathizers of Murder
item.description: Everyone has grievances, but no one is exempt from the rules of our constitutional order.

item.title: NYC Prosecutors Use A Dubious Maneuver To Try To Lock Up Daniel Penny
item.description: With Penny's future on the line, a judge is willing to 'take a chance' on a legal maneuver that only benefits the prosecution.

item.title: John Cornyn 'inclined' to back Trump FBI pick Kash Patel after Senate meeting
item.description: Sen. John Cornyn said after meeting with Kash Patel that he is inclined to support him to become the next FBI director.

item.title: Connecticut’s Fiscal Death Wish
item.description: The state may weaken or remove entirely a set of ‘guardrails’ that have kept it from budgetary ruin.

item.title: Godspeed to DOGE
item.description: Expectations for Elon Musk’s plan to root out government inefficiency need to be tempered, but we welcome the effort.
